root.message: The REG_AGG field for indicator 2-1-2, translated into en
root.data:
Regional and global aggregates of the prevalence of moderate or severe food insecurity (FI) based on FIES are computed as:

FI_REG = (_i FI_i × N_i) / (_i N_i)

where FI_i are the values of FI estimated for all countries in the regions for which available data allow to compute a reliable estimate, and N_i the corresponding population size.
